relation: the security are friendly and alert!! they will even walk you to your car if you want them to..
great diversity in the schools clubs..
the teachers i have had are all worth more that i paid for classes... hard to say that at beginning of school but in hind sight well worth it..
hang out in student life area! a really nice bunch of active smart people!
decent but this is the only thing lacking.
i am only taking two classes, but i feel challenged which is good!!
never be afrain=d to ask for help, everyone will go out of thier way to help. teachers and other students alike!
outstanding reliable caring faculty and teachers. fun community of students. i am most impressed with the level of support given by all memebers of this college!!
pageTitle: North Shore Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {62909=I attended this school thinking that I was alone. I was all wrong I have now been here since 2010 pursuing my career. There are so many options. The students are more than willing to help. They offer help around the clock. They help keep you motivated when you think that you can't. There are over a dozen of support groups if you don't understand. They have child care,flexible schedule's..etc, 34649=Apply for Financial Aide before May 1st every year. Sign up for orientation(if your a first time college student). Meet with an academic advisor for questions and help registering for the correct courses appropriate for your program of study. Meet with our transfer counselor when it is time and you decide to transfer., 79665=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Jennifer from Revere, MA 07/06/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 22 Categories Comments Campus Safety There are serious intercom techniques they they use, and test, every semester. What to do for fun Lots of stuff to do, outside of campus. Food and Dining The cafe food is great! However, not the healthiest. Dorm Life No on campus living. Academic Rigor All depending on your major, the classes can be challenging. However, professors are very helpful. Tips for prospective students Learn your course of study very well, this way, when you talk to advisers, you can fairly challenge their opinions, and ask intelligent questions.
